short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PowerExt Scribe Menu is a one-click AI writing tool. Compose emails, blogs, and more without switching tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PowerExt Scribe Menu is a Chrome Extension that simplifies your writing tasks with AI. Whether you need to write an email, a blog post, or any other content, you can access various AI tools from the context menu in your browser. You can compose, edit, analyse, summarize, and enhance your writing without switching tabs. PowerExt Scribe Menu helps you save time, improve productivity, and unleash your creativity.
